# Conversational Intelligence Training

## Overview
This recipe develops a SmolLM model into a sophisticated conversational agent using structured dialogue formats.

## Important Considerations
- XML-based response structuring
- Focus on natural dialogue flow
- Balanced conversation handling

## Training Tips
- Monitor response coherence
- Validate XML format consistency
- Test conversation flow

## Expected Outcomes
After training, the model should be able to:
- Maintain structured conversations
- Generate well-formatted responses
- Handle diverse dialogue scenarios
